2164.subject: MAE
2164.descrlong:
Theoretical and practical foundations in assessment with implications for standards-based  instruction. Includes descriptive and some inferential statistics and educational measurement.  Must be admitted to the Master of Arts in Education program to enroll in course (Offered fall and spring semesters as needed. May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online).

(Restricted to MAE AND SPED Majors)
